english.segment1: On the surface not a ripple. Undercurrent wages war. Quiet in the sanctuary. Sin is crouching at my door
english.segment2: How can I be so prone to wander. So prone to leave You. So prone to die. And how can You be so full of mercy. You race to meet me and bring my back to life
english.segment3: I wake to find my soul in fragments. Given to a thousand loves. But only One will have no rival. Hangs to heal me, spills His blood
english.segment4: How can I be so prone to wander. So prone to leave You. So prone to die. And how can You be so full of mercy. You race to meet me and bring my back to life
english.segment5: Curse-reversing Day of Jesus. When you finally seize my soul. Freedom from myself will be. The sweetest rest I've ever known
